price: Wͻkaa sε: “Lut, sε wanyae (wonsεm no ka a) wobεka wͻn a yɛapamo wͻn anaa yɛatu wͻn (afiri y’asaase soͻ) no ho.
arabic: قَالُواْ لَئِن لَّمۡ تَنتَهِ يَٰلُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ ٱلۡمُخۡرَجِينَ

version.title: Ashanti Translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Ashanti by Sheikh Haroun Ismaeel

meta.transliteration: qālū la-in lam tantahi yālūṭu latakūnanna mina al-mukh'rajīna
